activitiesTxt1: Mont-Tremblant is the perfect region for outdoor enthusiasts near Montreal. There are a ton of activities to check out, no matter the season. At Fort Ouest, we make the best of snowy winters and hot summers.
activitiesTxt2: Most of the activities we offer are avaiable all year round. Namely paintball, airsoft and wilderness survival. During winter, dog sledding and snowmobiling become available for those who like the outdoors.
